verses.name: Isaiah 50:2
verses.text: Wherefore, when I came, was there no man? when I called, was there none to answer? Is my hand shortened at all, that it cannot redeem? or have I no power to deliver? behold, at my rebuke I dry up the sea, I make the rivers a wilderness: their fish stinketh, because there is no water, and dieth for thirst.

verses.name: Isaiah 50:3
verses.text: I clothe the heavens with blackness, and I make sackcloth their covering.
